betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oTo assemble the terrestrial agglomeration plate, make a diagonal x of livingrock, with lapis in the edges, and place the plate on top of the middle livingrock!

The plate receives mana from a spark placed on it! Mana spreaders will work, but they will be really slow!

Make terrasteel by dropping a manasteel ingot, a mana diamond, and a mana pearl on the plate.
